comments:
CDT 2.1 GA
Linux: RHEL 3 AS.
JRE= J2RE 1.4.2 IBM build cxia321420-20040626 (JIT enabled: jitc)
running on a (fast) 2-processor 3.2 GHz.

Unfortunately, these steps aren't readily reproduceable, but:
1. Start up a fresh CDT session
2. Create a (Managed C++) project
I immediately got an IProblem, something like "Indexer path invalid"
3. I tried creating more projects to see if they would also see this,
and I think the answer was "No", but the first IProblem remained.
4. Create a file or class in some other project, kicking the indexer.
This causes the CME stack trace to appear on my console:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(AbstractList.java(Inlined
Compiled Code))
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(AbstractList.java(Compiled Code))
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.internal.scannerconfig.ManagedBuildCPathEntryContainer.addDefinedSymbols(ManagedBuildCPathEntryContainer.java:100)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.internal.scannerconfig.ManagedBuildCPathEntryContainer.getPathEntries(ManagedBuildCPathEntryContainer.java:219)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.PathEntryManager.getResolvedPathEntries(PathEntryManager.java:173)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.PathEntryManager.getResolvedPathEntries(PathEntryManager.java:157)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.core.model.CoreModel.getResolvedPathEntries(CoreModel.java:724)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CProject.getResolvedPathEntries(CProject.java:400)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CProject.computeSourceRoots(CProject.java:595)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CProject.computeSourceRoots(CProject.java:610)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CProject.buildStructure(CProject.java:582)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.Openable.generateInfos(Openable.java:291)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CElement.openWhenClosed(CElement.java:403)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CElement.getElementInfo(CElement.java:285)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CElement.getElementInfo(CElement.java:275)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.Parent.getChildren(Parent.java:54)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.model.CProject.getSourceRoots(CProject.java:478)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexAllProject.execute(IndexAllProject.java:81)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.processing.JobManager.run(JobManager.java:471)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:567)

I have added a few new synchronization points around the loading of the MBS 
build definitions and .cdtbuild project files in both the 2.1.1 branch and 
Head.  Hopefully, these fix the problem - I have never been able to reproduce 
the problem myself.  If you see it again, please re-open.
